weeks.weekly_task: Learn Vue.js basics: components, directives, and data binding; build a simple Vue.js app.
Master Vue.js advanced concepts like lifecycle hooks, Vue Router, and Vuex; extend the app with routing and state management.
Understand SASS/SCSS syntax, variables, nesting, mixins; refactor existing CSS into SASS for maintainability.
Advance Node.js skills focusing on asynchronous programming and performance optimization.
Build RESTful APIs with Express.js including middleware, routing, and error handling.
Learn Rails basics: MVC architecture, routing, and building a simple CRUD app.
Cover Python fundamentals and web frameworks basics to support backend tasks.
Improve MongoDB knowledge: schema design, aggregation, indexing, and performance tuning.
Enhance PostgreSQL skills with advanced querying, indexing, and transactions.
Learn MySQL basics including schema design, queries, and data manipulation.
Master Git with branching, merging, rebasing, and resolving conflicts in team environments.
Build a full stack application integrating frontend with Vue.js and SASS, backend with Node.js and Express, databases MongoDB and PostgreSQL, managed with Git version control.
